Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment:
It has indeed been proposed, see http://cr.i3wm.org/patch/393

I’ll reject this patch in the same spirit as the referenced one was rejected: with the fear of scope creep, i.e. people saying (somewhat rightly so) “you have the file_contents module, now you need to add this option to make that actually useful” and before we know it, we have a text processing language implemented in i3status.

Adding arbitrary lines of content to i3status can be done with a wrapper, and if you already have a contrib script that prepares some information, it should be simple to make that an i3status wrapper.
